title: Flipped Learning-Based Nursing Leadership Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Registered Nursing License and Basic Clinical Nursing Practice Experience
context.additional_context: Training program for hospital nursing managers/leaders to strengthen practical competencies. Conducts project-based assessments in a digital device-provided environment.

learning_goals: Achieve over 80% comprehension of nursing theories through flipped learning modules.
Score over 90 points in assessments of four core nursing skills (blood pressure measurement, medication preparation, nasogastric tube insertion, blood glucose monitoring).
Maintain knowledge retention at over 75% for three months post-training.
Complete and present a nursing management simulation report through team-based projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
